definition: to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from
(of a smell) strong/peak season (of a crop)/(classifier for the ordinal number of a crop, in the context of multiple harvests)

sentences.english: When the world sneezes, it's the global economy that catches the nastiest cold.
sentences.chinese: 世界一打喷嚏，全球经济就感冒。

sentences.english: Have you been missing laughing babies and sneezing pandas?
sentences.chinese: 你以前错过看笑不乐知的小宝贝和打喷嚏的熊猫吗？

sentences.english: He is allergic to cats. He sneezes whenever there is cat fur.
sentences.chinese: 他对猫敏感，每有猫毛就打喷嚏。

sentences.english: Multiple, early-morning sneezes may mean you're allergic to dust mites.
sentences.chinese: 清晨连续的打喷嚏则可能是粉尘过敏所致。

sentences.english: Nose is urticant, often think sneeze, be irritability rhinitis?
sentences.chinese: 鼻子痒，老想打喷嚏，是过敏性鼻炎吗？

sentences.english: Place a hand in front of your mouth when sneezing so that your soul cannot escape.
sentences.chinese: 打喷嚏的时候，用手捂住你的嘴，可以防止灵魂外逃。

sentences.english: Why do you sneeze when you get a cold?
sentences.chinese: 当你感冒时，为什么会打喷嚏？

sentences.english: I'm sneezing and my nose is running.
sentences.chinese: 我打喷嚏而且还流鼻涕。

sentences.english: I have a runny nose, am sneezing and also have a scratchy throat.
sentences.chinese: 我流鼻水，打喷嚏并且喉咙沙哑。

sentences.english: The elephant sneezed and fell on his knees, and that was the end of the monk.
sentences.chinese: 象打喷嚏而且落在他的膝，而且那是修道士的结束。

sentences.english: My nose tickles and I sneeze.
People have been sneezing in the front row.
sentences.chinese: 人们之前就已经在打喷嚏了。

sentences.english: Are You a Sneezer, Wheezer, Sniffer, or Dripper?
sentences.chinese: 你会打喷嚏，喘息，用鼻子吸气或流鼻涕吗？

sentences.english: This results in the nasal stuffiness , sneezing and mucous discharge of allergic rhinitis.
sentences.chinese: 这一结果在鼻滴漏，打喷嚏和粘液放电的过敏性鼻炎。

sentences.english: Keep good personal hygienic habit and cover the mouth and nose while sneezing or coughing.
sentences.chinese: 保持良好的个人卫生习惯，打喷嚏或咳嗽时应掩口鼻。

pinyin: shang4 hu1 xi1 dao4 gan3 ran3

definition: to catch cold/(common) cold/CL:場|场[chang2],次[ci4]/(coll.) to be interested in (often used in the negative)/(Tw) to detest/can't stand
